title: T206 Kleinow Boston and King Southern For Sale
author: stclaircards

posts.post_title: T206 Kleinow Boston and King Southern For Sale
posts.post_content:
T206 Kleinow Boston version.  Graded SGC 50. 
$195 shipped first class/insured ---will accept money orders or paypal gifts.

T206 King Southern League.  Graded SGC 40. 
$125 shipped first class/insured ---will accept money orders or paypal gifts.


First person that says "I'll take it" is the new owner.

Thanks.
